function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relying on internal rules rather than external legal environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for respiratory droplet transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social acceptance and legitimacy of businesses in the context of social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in demand for delivery services due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards new normal of social distancing and shelter at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uber’s policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted uber’s business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uber’s decision to deliver food from small restaurants free of charge may lead to increased demand and activity, creating challenges in maintaining safe and hygienic operations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vanishing demand due to shelter at home policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through close contact in ridesharing services","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People staying home and consuming digital content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial institutions offering educational classes in basic financial literacy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adaptation strategies for service organizations to cope with covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"E-commerce stock outs of essential items like hand sanitizer","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Price gouging by unscrupulous sellers during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly variable nature of online customer demand","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online communities and services in gymnasiums","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of online covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in transitioning services online","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High degree of interactivity in service delivery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online service delivery with no physical interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive signals are costly, leading some firms to choose not to adopt an accommodative posture.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inertial pressures to conform to laws, regulations, and decrees imposed by local and state governments.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deliberate communication strategies using accommodative signals are necessary, even if construction of hurricanes as acts of nature may limit proactive disease mitigation efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Information asymmetry in pandemic situations can hinder effective communication and response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surplus information held by some entities during a pandemic may not be effectively shared with {"name":"Theorizing and human connectedness in pandemic research impacting societal trust and organizational resilience.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Theorizing and rebranding without successful implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid turnover of untested ideas leading to fads","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting and minute guidelines from governments and chain owners creating challenges for food restaurant franchisees in implementing
